授業目的:
The objectives of this course are:
1. To help students acquire academic skills, with a focus on reading and writing
2. To help students develop study skills for higher education
到達目標:
1. Students will become better essay-writers.
2. Students will acquire note-taking skills.
3. Students will develop their reading, writing and study skills.
4. Students will gain academic vocabulary knowledge.
授業方法:
Online (On-Demand A type)
1.This course will be conducted in English only and English will be the means of communication between the students and the instructor.
2.The class materials, instructions and assignments for each session will be posted and become available through LUNA Class Material/Assignment on demand （「教材・課題」欄）by the actual class time each week. (There will be Zoom Meeting a few times during the term.)
＊Check LUNA「お知らせ」before the online class starts; there may be some messages about preparation for the first online class.

トピック.授業計画1:
Class will be conducted using the textbook and other materials provided online.
Students will be reading and learning the important points and do the exercises in the textbook and other materials provided online through LUNA.
The class materials, instructions and assignments for each session will be posted and become available on demand by the actual class time each week. There will be Zoom Meeting a few times during the term. Detailed plans will be provided at the first session.
Make sure to get the textbook by the first online class.
トピック.授業外学習2: One to two hours of homework can be expected each week.
